text: Læa cng xdthn tx taw khxng cea rwm kab brrda phu wingwxn tx phraphupenceakhxng phwk khea thang yam chea læa yam yen doy prarthna khwam pordpran khxng phraxngkh læa xya hı sayta khxng cea hanhe xxk cak phwk khea khna thi cea prasngkh khwam swyngam hæng chiwit khxng lok ni læa cea xya cheuxfang phu thi rea thahı hawcı khxng khea laley cak kar raluk thung rea læa ptibati tam xarmn ta khxng khea læa kickar khxng khea phinas suyhay
